Text: Thank you for calling TechConnect.

Text: How can I assist you today?

Text: Hi.

Text: It keeps cutting out and it's incredibly slow.
Speaker: A

Text: I understand how frustrating that can be.

Text: David, I'm here to help.

Text: Can you tell me more about the issue?
Speaker: B

Text: How long has this been happening?
Speaker: B

Text: It started a couple days ago, but today has been really bad.
Speaker: A

Text: I can barely load a webpage and my video calls keep dropping.
Speaker: A

Text: Okay, have you tried any troubleshooting steps, such as restarting your modem or router?
Speaker: B

Text: Yeah, I've done that times and I've also checked the cables.

Text: Nothing seems to work.
Speaker: A

Text: I see.
Speaker: B

Text: To assist you further, could you please provide your serial number of your modem?

Text: It's usually located on a sticker at the bottom of the device.

Text: Yeah, give me 1 second.
Speaker: A

Text: The serial number is D 1079 982-214-5167 thank you.

Text: David, I'm running a quick diagnostic on your connection.

Text: Okay.

Text: It seems like there might be an issue with the signal strength in your area.

Text: Have you moved your modem or router recently?
Speaker: B

Text: No.

Text: Everything is in the same place that it's always been.
Speaker: A

Text: I understand.

Text: Sometimes external factors can affect the signal.

Text: Has there been any construction or changes in your neighborhood recently?
Speaker: B

Text: Now that you mention it, they have been doing some road work down the street for the past week.
Speaker: A

Text: Could that be the cause of the problem?
Speaker: A

Text: It's possible the construction might be interfering with the underground cables.

Text: I can send a technician to investigate and see if there's anything that we can do to improve your signal.
